OrderTimeInForce.description:
- GTC: good til cancelled
 - GTT: good til time
 - IOC: immediate or cancel
 - FOK: fill or kill
OrderTimeInForce.title: Order Time in Force

ProposalState.description:
Proposal state transition:
Open ->
  - Passed -> Enacted.
  - Rejected.
Proposal can enter Failed state from any other state.

 - FAILED: Proposal became invalid and cannot be processed.
 - OPEN: Proposal is open for voting.
 - PASSED: Proposal has gained enough support to be executed.
 - REJECTED: Proposal has could not gain enough support to be executed.
 - ENACTED: Proposal has been executed and the changes under this proposal have now been applied.

token.title: a token corresponding to the party given in the request, and valid for subsequent requests for that party

submission.description: the bulk of the Order, including market, party, price, size, side, time in force, etc.

token.description: a token acquired from a SignIn request and corresponding to the party specified in the `submission`.

timestamp.title: nanoseconds since the epoch, for example `1580473859111222333` corresponds to `2020-01-31T12:30:59.111222333Z`

vegaInterval.title:
- I1M: 1 minute
 - I5M: 5 minutes
 - I15M: 15 minutes
 - I1H: 1 hour
 - I6H: 6 hours
 - I1D: 1 day

name.title: a human-understandable name for the Market, perhaps including a currency pair and a maturity date

decimalPlaces.title: the number of decimal places that a price must be shifted by in order to get a correct price denominated in the currency of the Market. ie `realPrice = price / 10^decimalPlaces`

vegaOrderType.description:
- LIMIT: used for Limit orders
 - MARKET: used for Market orders
 - NETWORK: used for orders where the initiating party is the network (used for distressed traders)
vegaOrderType.title: Order Type
